Binance has burned over $200M of BNB since starting in Q3 2017.  Over the same period, Ripple Inc has dumped over $1B of XRP on retail investors.  I doubt this market irrationality will last much longer. I think BNB will flippen XRP within the next 18 months.

Binance just completed their 9th quarterly burn for Q3, in which it burned nearly 2.1M BNB - more than in Q2 and Q3 combined. Since Binance burns 20% of profits, we can deduce that it made approximately $186 million in profit in Q3. This is the second-highest quarterly profit  https://t.co/0OVUmgcIIP
My Cat lifestyle after #BNB Burn  https://t.co/UDMJSiUGpZ

The 9th $BNB Burn has completed, so I made some Binance stats based on historical data:  Avg Quarterly burn: 1.614M BNB Avg Amount burned: $22.97M Avg Quarterly profit: $114.87M Avg Monthly profit: $38.29M Avg Weekly profit: $8.84M Avg Daily profit: $1.26M  This is so impressive!  https://t.co/vRZotq8Ps2

WOW!  This was was definitely a big one compared to the past few quarters for the Binance quarterly burn.  Burn # 9 = $36M USD       2M $BNB tokens burned Burn # 8 = $24M USD       809K $BNB tokens burned  50% jump in USD burned amount  Less and less $BNB tokens out in the market  https://t.co/tOMi4SJxVt

It appears Binance had just burned $36M USD or 2M $BNB token for the Q3 quarterly token burn.  In a few years, there will be less and less $BNB token out in the market. The writing is on the wall already for this to be a $100 token one day.  Just need for this bear market to end.
